SDSU BRIDGES








The Weber Honors College Mission


"If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together." - African
                                    Proverb


The Weber Honors College is about much more than aspiration and academic excellence.
                              It is also about providing a unique community and a gathering space for a diverse
                              group of students who share a commitment to achievement, to giving back to the communities
                              in which they live and work, to deep engagement, and to interdisciplinary conversation.

The Weber Honors College Core Values

Equality and Diversity
Flexibility and Openness
Imagination and Curiosity
Integrity and Persistence
Compassion and Courage
Excellence and Accountability
Generosity and Engagement
Teamwork and Collaboration
